arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the collection.

collectionEndpoint.description: Collection-specific endpoint used to submit index, search, and data upload requests to an OpenSearch Serverless collection.

dashboardEndpoint.description: Collection-specific endpoint used to access OpenSearch Dashboards.

kmsKeyArn.description: The ARN of the Amazon Web Services KMS key used to encrypt the collection.

name.description:
Name of the collection.

The following arguments are optional:

standbyReplicas.description: Indicates whether standby replicas should be used for a collection. One of `ENABLED` or `DISABLED`. Defaults to `ENABLED`.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the collection. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

type.description: Type of collection. One of `SEARCH`, `TIMESERIES`, or `VECTORSEARCH`. Defaults to `TIMESERIES`.

standbyReplicas.description: Indicates whether standby replicas should be used for a collection. One of `ENABLED` or `DISABLED`. Defaults to `ENABLED`.

type.description: Type of collection. One of `SEARCH`, `TIMESERIES`, or `VECTORSEARCH`. Defaults to `TIMESERIES`.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering ServerlessCollection resources.
